title: Can Bangladesh’s opposition unseat the prime minister?
description: Tens of thousands of protesters demand Shiekh Hasina step down and allow a caretaker government to oversee elections.

title: Poland raises alarm as Wagner forces move closer to border
description: PM Mateusz Morawiecki expresses concern over movement of Russian mercenary fighters in Belarus near the Polish border.

title: Israeli protesters keep pressure on Netanyahu over judicial overhaul
description: Demonstrators are out for the 30th week to demand that the government halt its judicial reform plan.

title: Kenya government and opposition agree to talks after protests
description: Kenyan government and opposition coalition agree to form a joint committee to 'resolve our differences amicably'.

title: Bangladesh police clash with protesters calling for PM resignation
description: Supporters of the BNP are calling on Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to step down amid anger about the cost of living.

title: Colombian president’s son arrested in money laundering probe
description: Nicolas Petro taken into custody on charges of money laundering and illicit enrichment.

title: Several killed in Thailand fireworks warehouse explosion
description: At least nine killed and more than 100 others injured in a blast at a fireworks warehouse in Sungai Kolok.

title: Bangladesh opposition protest in Dhaka, demand PM’s resignation
description: The Bangladesh Nationalist Party have called for the next election to be overseen by a neutral caretaker government.

title: Renard gives France 2-1 victory over Brazil at Women’s World Cup
description: France secures three vital points ahead of their final group match against tournament debutants Panama.

title: Beijing evacuates thousands as Doksuri pummels northern China
description: Authorities in the capital suspend sports events, shut several tourist spots and parks.

title: Sweden dominates Italy 5-0, secures World Cup knockout spot
description: Although a blow to Italy's confidence, the team can still advance to the last 16 by beating South Africa.

title: The video that shattered the silence around Manipur
description: Internet blackouts, media silence and political neglect - the case of the Indian state of Manipur.

title: US to help Australia develop guided missiles by 2025
description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin says the US will also help accelerate Australia's access to priority munitions.

title: The end of affirmative action will also hurt white students
description: The students admitted under the new 'race neutral' regime won't be receiving the 'stellar' education they hoped for.

title: CAR braces for referendum that may extend President Touadera’s rule
description: If passed, the referendum will scrap a two-term limit and enable Touadera to run again for the presidency.

title: Will food prices get higher?
description: The war in Ukraine, heatwaves and export bans on essential staples - threats to food supplies are rising once again.

title: Trump shares stage with Republican rivals amid mounting legal woes
description: Trump highlights record in office, attacks closet rival Ron DeSantis at conservative event in Iowa.

title: Father Paolo: Christian monk who disappeared after trying to talk to ISIL
description: The Italian breathed life into Syria's Mar Musa and championed interreligious understanding, until he disappeared.

title: Blinken offers Niger’s ousted leader Bazoum ‘unflagging support’
description: US Secretary of State says Washington will work to restore constitutional order in West African country following coup.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 521
description: These are the main developments as the Russian invasion of Ukraine enters its 521st day.

title: Four missing after Australian military helicopter crashes into Pacific
description: MRH-90 Taipan helicopter and crew missing after crashing into waters off the state of Queensland late last night.

title: For Sri Lankan Tamils, the Black July pogroms live on, 40 years later
description: The ethno-nationalist political underpinnings of Black July still characterise the Sri Lankan state today.

title: Biden publicly acknowledges 7th grandchild for first time
description: US president says 4-year-old granddaughter Navy is 'family matter', not a political issue.

title: US announces $345m military aid package for disputed Taiwan
description: Latest military aid package comes as China takes an increasingly aggressive stance towards the self-ruled island.
